summary: App with journey flow featuring a single breakpoint, system alert on user click, and audio enhancements at key moments (traveling, breakpoint, system alert, campfire)
architectural_notes: Journey flow: traveling → breakpoint → user click → system alert → campfire
Audio integration at multiple journey stages

existing_features.title: Reduce the journey flow to include only one break stop instead of multiple checkpoints, maintaining the existing traveling → break stop → continue pattern
Add background sound effect that plays during the traveling phase before reaching the break point
Add sound effect that plays when the break point is reached
Add sound effect that plays when the system alert is triggered after the user clicks to continue from the break point
Add sound effect that plays when reaching the final campfire destination

new_feature_requests.summary: Single breakpoint in journey flow with click-to-continue
Add sound effects at traveling, breakpoint, system alert, and campfire
